J

jaxbExport() - Method in class controller.ClientController
Exports the current list of clients to an XML file using JAXB.
jaxbImport() - Method in class controller.ClientController
Imports clients from an XML file using JAXB.
JdbcClientDao - Class in controller.db.impl
JdbcClientDao is an implementation of the ClientDao interface that provides data access operations for managing client records in a relational database.
JdbcClientDao() - Constructor for class controller.db.impl.JdbcClientDao
Default constructor for JdbcClientDao.
JdbcOrderDao - Class in controller.db.impl
JdbcOrderDao is an implementation of the OrderDao interface that provides data access operations for managing orders in a relational database.
JdbcOrderDao() - Constructor for class controller.db.impl.JdbcOrderDao
Default constructor for JdbcOrderDao.
JdbcProductDao - Class in controller.db.impl
JdbcProductDao is an implementation of the ProductDao interface that provides a comprehensive set of methods for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on products, ingredients, and allergens stored in a relational database using JDBC.
JdbcProductDao() - Constructor for class controller.db.impl.JdbcProductDao
Default constructor for JdbcProductDao.
